moduleMetadataJson.name: Write Messages to Users
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module utilizes the wall(1) or write(1) utilities, as appropriate,
          to send messages to users on the target system.
author: Jon Hart <jon_hart@rapid7.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: USERS
options.description: List of users to write(1) to, separated by commas.  wall(1)s to all users by default
